text: ${player}, would you rather do the dishes every night or take out the trash even when it's raining? ${player} decides and whoever gets the worst chore drinks 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, would you rather wake up early on weekends or sleep in until noon? Those who disagree drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather leave your socks everywhere or pick up ${player}'s? Your partner gives out 3 sips if you admit your laziness.
All couples: would you rather cook together in chaos or have one cook while the other relaxes? The chaos cooks drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather choose the movie tonight or let ${player} decide? Whoever gives in drinks 2 sips of goodwill.
${player} and ${player}, who would rather have control of the remote? The other drinks 3 sips and can negotiate.
All couples: spotless apartment or organized mess? The neat freaks drink 2 sips, the messy ones give out.
${player}, would you rather share all your food with ${player} or protect your plate? If you share, your partner drinks 2 sips of gratitude.
${player} and ${player}, would you rather grocery shop together or delegate to one? Whoever goes alone can make the other drink 3 sips.
${player}, would you rather sleep with the window open even in winter or everything closed? If ${player} disagrees, negotiate or drink 2 sips each.
Couples game: separate blankets or blanket war? Blanket thieves drink 3 sips automatically.
${player}, would you rather get ready quickly in the morning or take your time? ${player} drinks 2 sips if they're always waiting for you.
All couples: would you rather have help without asking or be asked first? The interventionists drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather have a quick breakfast or Sunday brunch with ${player}? The foodie gives out 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, do you manage the budget down to the penny or keep financial independence? The accountants drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather have a quiet movie night or go out to a restaurant with ${player}? Vote, the loser drinks 3 sips.
All couples: backpacking adventure vacation or all-inclusive hotel? Adventurers give 2 sips to the lazy ones.
${player}, would you rather have a surprise weekend organized by ${player} or plan together? If you trust them, your partner drinks 2 pressure sips.
Couples game: material gifts or experiences to share? Materialists drink 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, big birthday party or intimate celebration? Act out your last birthday, the most sober drinks 3 sips.
All couples: explore a new city or return to your favorite spots? The routine lovers drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather chat for hours at a caf√© with ${player} or do sports together? Athletes make philosophers drink 3 sips.
Couples game: game night with friends or romantic one-on-one? The least romantic drink 2 shameful sips.
${player}, would you rather have hidden sweet notes or public declarations? If ${player} blushes, they give out 3 sips.
All couples: football match or ballet? Those who disagree drink 2 sips and negotiate.
${player}, nature walk or shopping with ${player}? The city person drinks 3 sips, the hiker gives out.
Couples game: trendy new restaurant or your usual spot? Culinary adventurers make routine lovers drink 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, handmade gift or expensive gift? Whoever has given a failed gift drinks 3 sips.
All couples: vacation with other couples or just the two of you? The social ones drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather watch the sunset in silence with ${player} or sunrise after an all-nighter? Romantics give out 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, do you settle disputes hot or cold? Whoever sulks longest drinks 3 sips.
Couples game: need space or immediate cuddle after a fight? The cuddlers drink 2 sips.
${player}, do you speak up when ${player} annoys you or keep it to yourself? Diplomats drink 3 sips.
All couples: constructive criticism or let it be? Those who can't handle criticism drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather talk about your feelings or show them through actions to ${player}? The reserved ones drink 2 sips.
${player} and ${player}, deep discussions or light conversations? Act out your last serious discussion, the most dramatic drinks 3 sips.
Couples game: lots of questions when something's wrong or let them come to you? The curious drink 2 sips.
${player}, do you confide in ${player} first or your friends? If it's not your partner, they give out 3 hurt sips.
All couples: forgive easily or need time? The grudge holders drink 2 therapeutic sips.
${player} and ${player}, would you rather have your needs guessed or express them clearly? Failed telepaths drink 3 sips.
${player}, do you approach serious topics with ${player} in a planned way or spontaneously? Strategists drink 2 sips.
All couples: laugh about past fights or never mention them? Share one, the most ridiculous drink 2 sips.
${player}, cute nicknames in public with ${player} or discretion? If you have an embarrassing one, drink 3 sips together.
${player} and ${player}, long apology message or face-to-face discussion? Whoever has the worst technique drinks 2 sips.
Couples game: defend your partner even when they're wrong or stay objective? Blind lawyers drink 2 sips.
${player}, would you rather have long silent cuddles or chat late into the night with ${player}? Chatterboxes drink 3 sips.
All couples: endless foreplay or straight to the point? The impatient drink 2 modest sips.
${player}, passionate kisses in public or discrete gestures with ${player}? Exhibitionists give out 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, give or receive a massage? The most selfish drinks 2 sips.
Couples game: try new things or stick to the classics? The routine lovers drink 2 adventurous sips.
${player}, talk about fantasies with ${player} or keep the mystery? The mysterious drink 3 sips.
All couples: dim light or complete darkness? Vote discreetly, minority drinks 2 sips.
${player}, whispered sweet nothings or direct compliments to ${player}? Demo it, the most romantic gives out 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, shower or romantic bath? Water savers drink 2 ecological sips.
Couples game: surprise or be surprised? Control freaks drink 2 sips.
${player}, morning or evening cuddles with ${player}? Late risers drink 3 morning sips.
All couples: hand in hand or arm around waist? The least tactile drink 2 sips.
${player}, naughty little gifts or sensual experiences with ${player}? Prudes drink 3 blushing sips.
${player} and ${player}, would you rather remember your first kiss or first 'I love you'? Share, the cutest makes the group drink 2 sips.
Couples game: spontaneity or prepared atmosphere? Planners drink 2 improvisation sips.
${player}, talk about future plans with ${player} or enjoy the present? Future-stressed drink 3 zen sips.
All couples: live in the city or countryside? City and country folk face off, minority drinks 2 sips.
${player}, kids or world tour with ${player}? Debate for 30 seconds, the least convincing drinks 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, big wedding or intimate ceremony? Those who've already mentally planned drink 2 sips.
Couples game: dog, cat or nothing? The allergic drink 2 consolation sips.
${player}, demanding career or time for ${player}? Workaholics drink 3 balance sips.
All couples: meet the in-laws quickly or wait? The brave drink 2 courageous sips.
${player}, Christmas separately with family or together? If ${player} disagrees, negotiate while drinking 2 sips each.
${player} and ${player}, save or enjoy now? The grasshoppers drink 3 sips, the ants give out.
Couples game: grow old here or move abroad? Homebodies drink 2 adventure sips.
${player}, established traditions or improvisation with ${player}? Organization maniacs drink 3 spontaneous sips.
All couples: mutual friends or separate circles? Those who don't like their partner's friends drink 2 diplomatic sips.
${player}, imagine in 5 years or 20 years with ${player}? The most optimistic give out 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, professional success or time together? One minute debate, loser drinks 2 sips.
Couples game: pass on your values or total freedom for kids? Future strict parents drink 2 sips.
${player}, matching t-shirts with ${player} or identical kitsch ringtones? The least confident drinks 3 shameful sips.
All couples: cut each other's hair or never? The bravest give out 2 sips.
${player}, cheesy romantic comedy or horror movie with ${player}? Scaredy-cats drink 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, shared or separate Netflix account? If you know each other's passwords, toast 2 sips.
Couples game: sing in the car or musical silence? Shower singers drink 2 sips.
${player}, show your morning face to ${player} or hide your snoring? Morning perfects give out 3 sips.
All couples: same favorite dish or culinary opposites? Picky eaters drink 2 sips.
${player}, make a complicated dish for ${player} or have them assemble IKEA furniture? The least skilled drinks 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, who controls the decor? The design dictator drinks 2 power sips.
Couples game: share passwords or privacy? The secretive drink 2 mysterious sips.
${player}, cheesy duet karaoke or TikTok choreography with ${player}? Do a 10-second demo or drink 3 sips.
All couples: inappropriate laughter or tears during a movie? The most emotional drink 2 sips.
${player}, let ${player} choose your clothes or vice versa? The worst dressed drinks 3 fashion sips.
${player} and ${player}, funny private secret or tell friends everything? The gossips drink 2 sips.
Couples game: naughty nap or pillow fight? The tired drink 2 energetic sips.
${player}, does ${player} better imitate your voice or your mannerisms? Mandatory demonstration, best imitator gives out 3 sips.
All couples: wedding where you know no one or boring family dinner? Antisocials drink 2 sips.
${player}, support ${player}'s weird passion or have them support yours? Confess your shameful passions and drink 3 sips.
${player} and ${player}, ridiculous public slow dance or off-key serenade? The shy drink 2 courage sips.
Couples game: finish each other's sentences or secret language? Prove it now or drink 2 sips.
${player}, face a spider for ${player} or flee together? Heroes give out 3 sips.
All couples: tell your day in detail or just the essentials? Chatterboxes drink 2 sips.
${player}, have an embarrassing photo of ${player} or vice versa? Show it or drink 3 shameful sips.
${player} and ${player}, lie about a bad gift or tell the truth? Kind hypocrites drink 2 sips.
Couples final: ${player} and ${player}, day without phones together or constant communication? Put your phones down for 2 minutes or drink 5 sips! Congrats, you know each other better!
